changeSet.author: se10
changeSet.sql: UPDATE KRLC_CNTRY_T t1 SET t1.postal_cntry_nm = (SELECT REPLACE(ASCIISTR(t2.postal_cntry_nm),'\00C5','A') FROM KRLC_CNTRY_T t2 WHERE t2.POSTAL_CNTRY_CD=t1.POSTAL_CNTRY_CD) WHERE INSTR(ASCIISTR(t1.postal_cntry_nm), '\00C5')>0 / UPDATE KRLC_CNTRY_T t1 SET t1.postal_cntry_nm = (SELECT REPLACE(ASCIISTR(t2.postal_cntry_nm),'\00F4','o') FROM KRLC_CNTRY_T t2 WHERE t2.POSTAL_CNTRY_CD=t1.POSTAL_CNTRY_CD) WHERE INSTR(ASCIISTR(t1.postal_cntry_nm), '\00F4')>0 / UPDATE KRLC_CNTRY_T t1 SET t1.postal_cntry_nm = (SELECT REPLACE(ASCIISTR(t2.postal_cntry_nm),'\00E9','e') FROM KRLC_CNTRY_T t2 WHERE t2.POSTAL_CNTRY_CD=t1.POSTAL_CNTRY_CD) WHERE INSTR(ASCIISTR(t1.postal_cntry_nm), '\00E9')>0 / commit /
